All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminActivity
AdminActivity is the main activity for organizers, setting up the navigation controller and special navigation bar for admin-specific views only
AdminBrowseEvent
Fragment for browsing and managing events in the Admin interface.
AdminBrowseFacilities
Fragment for browsing and managing facilities in the Admin interface.
AdminBrowseImages
Fragment class for browsing and managing images in the Admin interface.
AdminBrowseProfile
Fragment for browsing and managing user profiles in the Admin interface.
AdminEventArrayAdapter
EventArrayAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter for displaying a list of Event objects in a ListView or GridView.
AdminEventDetails
Fragment for displaying detailed information about an event in the Admin interface.
AdminEventFragment
Fragment that displays details of an event in the Admin interface.
AdminEventViewModel
View model for the event fragment.
AdminModerationSearchFragment
Fragment for performing moderation-related searches in the Admin interface.
CameraFragment
Fragment to handle the QR code scanning functionality.
CameraViewModel
ViewModel class for the Camera Fragment.
Event
This class creates an event object with getters and setters to its attributes
EventArrayAdapter
EventArrayAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter for displaying a list of Event objects in a ListView or GridView.
EventCreateFragment
Fragment for creating events within the organizer's UI.
EventDetailsFragment
Fragment for displaying the event details and enabling the editing of an event.
EventEditFragment
Fragment for editing event details.
EventFragment
Fragment representing an event's details and waitlist functionality.
EventJoinFragment
A fragment that handles joining an event's waitlist.
EventOrgFragment
Fragment representing the organizer's view for a specific event.
EventOrgFragment2
Fragment representing the organizer's view for a specific event.
EventOrgViewModel
ViewModel class for managing event data in the organizer's event view.
EventOrgViewModel2
ViewModel class for managing event data in the organizer's event view, including participant details.
EventViewModel
ViewModel class for managing event data in the UI.
ExampleUITest
A simple UI test, delete when we have actual UI tests
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
Firebase
This class is used to interface with Firebase and should be used for all Firebase operations.
Firebase.CheckListener
Interface for functions that check a conditional.
Firebase.DataListRetrievalListener
Interface for functions that retrieves a list of strings.
Firebase.DataRetrievalListener
Interface for functions that retrieve string.
Firebase.EventListRetrievalListener
Interface for functions that retrieve an array of events
Firebase.EventRetrievalListener
Interface for getEvent.
Firebase.ImageListRetrievalListener
Interface for functions that return list of image in Uri format.
Firebase.ImageRetrievalListener
Interface for functions that return an image in Uri format.
Firebase.InitializationListener
Interface for functions that initializes data and doesn't return anything
Firebase.NotificationListRetrievalListener
Interface for functions that retrieve the notifications for this use
Firebase.QueryRetrievalListener
Interface for admin functions that retrieve an array of document snapshots to be processed later
Firebase.UserListRetrievalListener
Interface for functions that retrieve an array of users
Firebase.UserRetrievalListener
Interface for getUser.
HomeFragment
Fragment that serves as the home screen for regular users, displaying basic event details.
HomeViewModel
ViewModel class for managing and providing home screen event data.
ImageAdapter
This class is used to display images in a recycler view
ImageAdapter.ImageViewHolder
This class is used to display images in a recycler view.
LoginTests
Test cases for users according to user stories
MainActivity
The MainActivity class is the entry point of the application.
Notifications
The Notifications class represents a notification that includes details such as title, description, date, and priority.
NotificationsArrayAdapter
The NotificationsArrayAdapter is a custom adapter used to display a list of notifications in a ListView.
NotificationsFragment
Fragment to display and manage user notifications.
NotificationsViewModel
ViewModel class for managing the notification text in the app.
OrganizerActivity
OrganizerActivity is the main activity for organizers, setting up the navigation controller and Navigation Bar for organizer-specific views.
OrganizerEventsListViewModel
Shared ViewModel for the Organizer actions.
OrganizerEventsListViewModelFactory
Factory class for creating instances of the OrganizerEventsListViewModel.
OrganizerHomeFragment
Fragment that displays the home screen for an organizer, showing information about an event.
OrganizerHomeViewModel
ViewModel for the Organizer Home Fragment.
OrganizerHomeViewModelFactory
Factory class for creating instances of the OrganizerHomeViewModel.
OrganizerProfileFragment
Fragment representing the organizer's profile view, allowing users to view and edit their personal details, profile picture, and other information.
OrganizerProfileViewModel
ViewModel for managing and exposing organizer profile data to the UI.
OrganizerProfileViewModelFactory
Factory class for creating an instance of OrganizerProfileViewModel.
OrganizerTests
Test cases for Organizers according to user stories
ProfileFragment
Fragment responsible for displaying and managing user profile details.
ProfileViewModel
ViewModel class for managing user profile data in the UI, including name, email, phone number, and other user information.
ProfileViewModelFactory
Factory class for creating instances of ProfileViewModel with a specified context.
QRCodeGenerator
QRCodeGenerator creates a QR code and returns it as a bitmap
SharedEventViewModel
ViewModel class for sharing event-related data between fragments or activities.
TextDrawable
TextDrawable is a custom Drawable class that draws a specified text centered on a canvas.
User
Represents a User with personal details such name, lastname, email, phone, and facility.
UserActivity
UserActivity is the main activity for Users, setting up the navigation controller and Navigation Bar for user-specific activities.
UserArrayAdapter
UserArrayAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter for displaying a list of User objects in a ListView or GridView.
UserTests
Test cases for users according to user stories
